create: INSERT INTO notifications (userId, postId, commentId) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
getAllActive: SELECT n.*, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, DATE_FORMAT(n.notificationDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS 'notificationDateM', TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, DATE_FORMAT(n.notificationDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS 'notificationDateH', TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, DATE_FORMAT(n.notificationDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS 'notificationDateD', u.firstName, u.lastName, u.imageUrl FROM notifications n LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = n.userId WHERE n.active=1 && n.userId != ? ORDER BY notificationDate DESC
getAll: SELECT n.*, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, DATE_FORMAT(n.notificationDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS 'notificationDateM', TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, DATE_FORMAT(n.notificationDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS 'notificationDateH', TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, DATE_FORMAT(n.notificationDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS 'notificationDateD', COALESCE(u.firstName,'') AS 'firstName', COALESCE(u.lastName,'') AS 'lastName', COALESCE(u.imageUrl,'') AS 'userImage' FROM notifications n LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = n.userId WHERE n.userId != ? ORDER BY notificationDate DESC
disable: UPDATE notifications SET active=0 WHERE id=?
enable: UPDATE notifications SET active=1 WHERE id=?
